title: #265: Inside the So-called Sweat Lodge with Laura Tucker - Profiling The "Guru", Part 5
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti interview Laura Tucker who attended the New Age "Spiritual Warrior" Retreat led by JAR in Sedona Arizona.


Laura entered the so-called sweat lodge with her friend Liz Neuman and they sat together. Liz Neuman was taken to hospital and was in intensive care for a week before she died.

Laura takes us behind the scenes of that catastrophic "retreat".


Listen to Laura's podcast "Free Your Inner Guru" https://lauratucker.com/

 

#HerNameWasKirbyBrown

#HerNameWasLizNeuman

#HisNameWasJamesShore
